changeSet.createView: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S1.cerf_no) AS id, S1.cerf_no, S1.cerf_ver, area = S1.area_cd + '-' + S2.area_desc, sts = S1.sts_cd + '-' + S3.sts_desc, S1.issu_dt, S1.cerf_exp_dt, remain_days = CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, GETDATE(), S1.cerf_exp_dt) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY, GETDATE(), S1.cerf_exp_dt) END, S1.appl_id, S4.mnfctr_nm_ch, S1.cerf_tag, S5.image_file, S1.upld_file, S1.lst_mtn_usr, S1.lst_mtn_dt FROM cerf AS S1 LEFT JOIN area_desc AS S2 ON S2.area_cd = S1.area_cd LEFT JOIN sts_desc AS S3 ON S3.sts_cd = S1.sts_cd LEFT JOIN mnfctr AS S4 ON S4.uni_no = S1.appl_id LEFT JOIN cerf_img AS S5 ON S5.cerf_tag = S1.cerf_tag
